Fourier decomposition table

Source: R/fft_base.R
fft_tab.Rd

Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) of a series of temperatures with resulting frequencies, periods, coefficients and powers in a single table.

Usage

fft_tab(s, t, period = TRUE, power = TRUE)

Arguments

s

num. Sampled temperatures at constant interval.

t

int. Time window, \(t=N\Delta t\) where \(\Delta t\) is the sampling interval.

period

bool. To include period or not, default TRUE.

power

bool. To include power or not, default TRUE.

Value

A table with:

  • \(f\) the harmonics frequencies \(1/y,\ldots \ell/t\)

  • \(p\) the harmonics periods

  • \(f\) the Fourier coefficients of \(s\) of length \(\ell\), whose coefficients are \(c_{0},c_{1},\ldots,c_{\ell-1}\)

  • \(P\) array of powers, \(P[n] = |c_{n}|\) for \(n=1,\ldots,\ell-1\)

Examples


fft_tab(hobo$t_hobo[1:(24 * 5)], 24*5)
#>      frequency     period               coefficient       power
#> 1  0.000000000   0.000000 17.619925000+0.000000000i 17.61992500
#> 2  0.008333333 120.000000  0.352106589+1.112782143i  1.16716029
